## hashCode() 

生成hashCode， 结果为number

**Signature:**

```typescript
function hashCode(str: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | 需要hash的字符串 |

**Returns:**

number

返回 hashCode

## Example


```ts
hashCode('1806328384@qq.com')  // 288642256
hashCode('1806328384@qq.com')  // 288642256
hashCode('y70088888@163.c0m')  // 1923653638
```
